info.title: LandPKS API System
info.description:
This is Web Service description for LandPKS Project API System. This documentation follows [..] to describe all Web Services API operations of LandPKS Project. It allows third-parties and developers be able to interact with LandPKS's data (LandInfo, LandCover...). 
                        


 version : The current version of internal recipe database. Each time when new plot are put into the server through the web service, the internal database version is incremented. If the version == empty or version = -1, this is default value, it means that the latest API version is used 
                        
 Action and object : Additional data includes action and object to identify PUT or POST or GET or DELETE action and which object do you want to interact (landinfo, landcover or all)? 
                        
 Meta data: The rest of parameters are metadata (landinfo data or landcover data) want to put and run model

put.description: This operation allows to insert new data object of LandInfo to cloud data store.

parameters.name: auth_key
parameters.description: Authenticatin key for using API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the plot where data was collected.

parameters.name: recorder_name
parameters.description: LandInfo recorder name. It is email that users registered to use LandPKS services.

parameters.name: test_plot
parameters.description: Identifies plot as test plot (deleted from database after 30 days from upload) or real plot (permanant record in database), TRUE = test plot, FALSE = real plot.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of plot's geographic location in decimal degrees.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of plot's geographic location in decimal degrees.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City location.

parameters.name: modified_date
parameters.description: Time stamp for successful upload of data collected.

parameters.name: land_cover
parameters.description: Observed land cover. Land cover selections are a modified version of NRCS and WOCAT classes. SINGLE elemet in SET { tree cover, >25% canopy ; shrub cover, >50% cover ; grassland, >50% grass ; savanna, 10-20% tree cover ; garden/mixed ; cropland ; developed ; water ; grassland ; forest ; village or city ; barren ; barren, < 5% Veg Cover ; Water, Swamp/Mash }
parameters.format: SINGLE elemet in SET { tree cover, >25% canopy ; shrub cover, >50% cover ; grassland, >50% grass ; savanna, 10-20% tree cover ; garden/mixed ; cropland ; developed ; water ; grassland ; forest ; village or city ; barren ; barren, < 5% Veg Cover ; Water, Swamp/Mash }

parameters.name: grazed
parameters.description: Local knowledge of grazing. TRUE = yes, this land has been grazed by livestock in the last year; FALSE = no, this land has not been grazed in the last year.

parameters.name: grazing
parameters.description: IF grazed = TRUE, THEN type of animals that are grazing listed (any combination of LIVESTOCK, GOATS, SHEEP, WILDLIFE). None or combination elements in Set {LIVESTOCK, GOAT, SHEEP,WILDLIFE,CATTLE}
parameters.format: None or combination elements in Set {LIVESTOCK, GOAT, SHEEP,WILDLIFE,CATTLE}

parameters.name: flooding
parameters.description: Local knowledge of flooding. TRUE = yes, this land has flooded for more than 2 weeks in the last year; FALSE = no, this land has not been flooded for more than 2 weeks in the.

parameters.name: slope
parameters.description: Slope in degrees. Option for either discrete value (using clinometer on phone) or slope classes (using icons on phone). Single element in {0-2% ; 3-5% ; 6-10% ; 11-15% ; 16-30% ; 31-60% ; >60%}

parameters.name: slope_shape
parameters.description: Shape of both downslope and crosslope (linear, convex, concave). SINGLE element in Downslope set +  , + SINGLE element in Cross-slope
parameters.format: SINGLE element in Downslope set +  , + SINGLE element in Cross-slope Downslope = {LINEAR ; CONVEX;CONCAVE} Cross-Slope = {LINEAR ; CONVEX; CONCAVE}

parameters.name: bedrock_depth
parameters.description: If digging stopped due to reaching bedrock, level at which digging stopped (in cm).

parameters.name: stopped_digging_depth
parameters.description: If digging stopped due to any reason other than reaching bedrock, level at which digging stopped (in cm).

parameters.name: rock_fragment_for_soil_horizon_1
parameters.description: Percent of soil containing rock fragments (fragments > 5mm diameter) Horizontal layer 1. Single element in set {0-15% ; 15-35% ; 35-60% ; >60%}

parameters.name: rock_fragment_for_soil_horizon_2
parameters.description: Percent of soil containing rock fragments (fragments > 5mm diameter) Horizontal layer 2. Single element in set {0-15% ; 15-35% ; 35-60% ; >60%}

parameters.name: rock_fragment_for_soil_horizon_3
parameters.description: Percent of soil containing rock fragments (fragments > 5mm diameter) Horizontal layer 3. Single element in set {0-15% ; 15-35% ; 35-60% ; >60%}

parameters.name: rock_fragment_for_soil_horizon_4
parameters.description: Percent of soil containing rock fragments (fragments > 5mm diameter) Horizontal layer 4. Single element in set {0-15% ; 15-35% ; 35-60% ; >60%}

parameters.name: rock_fragment_for_soil_horizon_5
parameters.description: Percent of soil containing rock fragments (fragments > 5mm diameter) Horizontal layer 5. Single element in set {0-15% ; 15-35% ; 35-60% ; >60%}

parameters.name: rock_fragment_for_soil_horizon_6
parameters.description: Percent of soil containing rock fragments (fragments > 5mm diameter) Horizontal layer 6. Single element in set {0-15% ; 15-35% ; 35-60% ; >60%}

parameters.name: rock_fragment_for_soil_horizon_7
parameters.description: Percent of soil containing rock fragments (fragments > 5mm diameter) Horizontal layer 7. Single element in set {0-15% ; 15-35% ; 35-60% ; >60%}

parameters.name: texture_for_soil_horizon_1
parameters.description: Texture of soil for each layer. Soil texture determined by hand. Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}
parameters.format: Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}

parameters.name: texture_for_soil_horizon_2
parameters.description: Texture of soil for each layer. Soil texture determined by hand. Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}
parameters.format: Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}

parameters.name: texture_for_soil_horizon_3
parameters.description: Texture of soil for each layer. Soil texture determined by hand. Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}
parameters.format: Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}

parameters.name: texture_for_soil_horizon_4
parameters.description: Texture of soil for each layer. Soil texture determined by hand. Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}
parameters.format: Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}

parameters.name: texture_for_soil_horizon_5
parameters.description: Texture of soil for each layer. Soil texture determined by hand. Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}
parameters.format: Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}

parameters.name: texture_for_soil_horizon_6
parameters.description: Texture of soil for each layer. Soil texture determined by hand. Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}
parameters.format: Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}

parameters.name: texture_for_soil_horizon_7
parameters.description: Texture of soil for each layer. Soil texture determined by hand. Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}
parameters.format: Single element in set {SAND ; LOAMY SAND ; SANDY LOAM ;LOAM; SILT LOAM ; SANDY CLAY LOAM ; CLAY LOAM ; SILTY CLAY LOAM ; SANDY CLAY ; CLAY ; SILTY CLAY}

parameters.name: surface_salt
parameters.description: Salt observed at the soil surface. TRUE = salt observed at the soil surface; FALSE = no salt observed at the soil surface

parameters.name: surface_cracking
parameters.description: Deep, vertical cracks visible in the soil profile. TRUE = deep, vertical cracks visible; FALSE = no deep vertical cracks visible

parameters.name: soil_pit_photo_url
parameters.description: URL link for soil pit photo

parameters.name: soil_samples_photo_url
parameters.description: URL link for soil samples photo

parameters.name: landscape_north_photo_url
parameters.description: URL link for North landscape photo

parameters.name: landscape_east_photo_url
parameters.description: URL link for East landscape photo

parameters.name: landscape_south_photo_url
parameters.description: URL link for South landscape photo

parameters.name: landscape_west_photo_url
parameters.description: URL link for West landscape photo

200.description: Response will be an object containing the ID of record that is created in Database (record_id or ID)

put.description: This operation allows to insert new data object of LandCover to cloud data store.

parameters.name: auth_key
parameters.description: Authenticatin key for using API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the plot where data was collected.

parameters.name: recorder_name
parameters.description: LandInfo recorder name. It is email that users registered to use LandPKS services.

parameters.name: transect
parameters.description: Direction of transect recorded (N, S, E, W). SINGLE element in SET {WEST ; NORTH ; SOUTH ; EAST}
parameters.format: SINGLE element in SET {WEST ; NORTH ; SOUTH ; EAST}

parameters.name: segment
parameters.description: Segment of each transect where observations are recorded (5 segments recorded every 5 meters of each transect). SINGLE element in SET {5m ; 10m ; 15m ; 20m ; 25m}

parameters.name: canopy_height
parameters.description: Header for each height class for vegetation height observations for each segment. SINGLE element in SET { <10cm ; 10-50cm ; 50cm-1m ; 1-2m ; 2-3m ; >3m}

parameters.name: canopy_gap
parameters.description: Observed canopy gaps >1m; TRUE = canopy gap present, FALSE = no canopy gap present

parameters.name: basal_gap
parameters.description: Observed basal gaps >1m; TRUE = basal gap present, FALSE = no basal gap present

parameters.name: species_of_interest_1
parameters.description: Observed count of species 1 (species determined by user on plot by plot basis)

parameters.name: species_of_interest_2
parameters.description: Observed count of species 2 (species determined by user on plot by plot basis)

parameters.name: dominant_woody_species
parameters.description: dominant_woody_species

parameters.name: dominant_nonwoody_species
parameters.description: dominant_nonwoody_species

parameters.name: stick_segment_0
parameters.description: All observed cover elements at segment 1 of the respective transect. SUBSET of SET = { Bare ; Trees ; Shrubs ; Sub-shrubs ; Perennial grasses ; Annuals ; Herb Litter ; Wood Litter ; Rock}
parameters.format: SUBSET of SET = { Bare ; Trees ; Shrubs ; Sub-shrubs ; Perennial grasses ; Annuals ; Herb Litter ; Wood Litter ; Rock}

parameters.name: stick_segment_1
parameters.description: All observed cover elements at segment 2 of the respective transect. SUBSET of SET = { Bare ; Trees ; Shrubs ; Sub-shrubs ; Perennial grasses ; Annuals ; Herb Litter ; Wood Litter ; Rock}
parameters.format: SUBSET of SET = { Bare ; Trees ; Shrubs ; Sub-shrubs ; Perennial grasses ; Annuals ; Herb Litter ; Wood Litter ; Rock}

parameters.name: stick_segment_2
parameters.description: All observed cover elements at segment 3 of the respective transect. SUBSET of SET = { Bare ; Trees ; Shrubs ; Sub-shrubs ; Perennial grasses ; Annuals ; Herb Litter ; Wood Litter ; Rock}
parameters.format: SUBSET of SET = { Bare ; Trees ; Shrubs ; Sub-shrubs ; Perennial grasses ; Annuals ; Herb Litter ; Wood Litter ; Rock}

parameters.name: stick_segment_3
parameters.description: All observed cover elements at segment 4 of the respective transect. SUBSET of SET = { Bare ; Trees ; Shrubs ; Sub-shrubs ; Perennial grasses ; Annuals ; Herb Litter ; Wood Litter ; Rock}
parameters.format: SUBSET of SET = { Bare ; Trees ; Shrubs ; Sub-shrubs ; Perennial grasses ; Annuals ; Herb Litter ; Wood Litter ; Rock}

parameters.name: stick_segment_4
parameters.description: All observed cover elements at segment 5 of the respective transect. SUBSET of SET = { Bare ; Trees ; Shrubs ; Sub-shrubs ; Perennial grasses ; Annuals ; Herb Litter ; Wood Litter ; Rock}
parameters.format: SUBSET of SET = { Bare ; Trees ; Shrubs ; Sub-shrubs ; Perennial grasses ; Annuals ; Herb Litter ; Wood Litter ; Rock}

200.description: Response will be an object containing the ID of record that is created in Database (record_id or ID)

delete.summary: Delete a LandInfo Object by LandInfo Plot ID
delete.description: This operation allows to delete object of LandInfo by LandInfo Plot ID to cloud data store.

parameters.name: auth_key
parameters.description: Authenticatin key for using API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: LandInfo Plot ID.

200.description: An array containing the ID’s of landcovers or landinfos to delete is given

delete.summary: Delete a LandCover Object by LandCover ID
delete.description: This operation allows to delete object of LandCover by LandCover ID in cloud data store.

parameters.name: auth_key
parameters.description: Authenticatin key for using API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: LandCover  ID.

200.description: An array containing the ID’s of landcovers or landinfos to delete is given

delete.summary: Delete a LandCover Object by par [Recorder_name and name]
delete.description: This operation allows to delete object of LandCover by [Recorder_name and name] in cloud data store.

parameters.name: auth_key
parameters.description: Authenticatin key for using API.

parameters.name: recorder_name
parameters.description: Recorder name to collect landcover.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Plot name that collects landcover records.

200.description: An array containing the ID’s of landcovers or landinfos to delete is given

delete.summary: Delete a LandInfo Plot by par [Recorder_name and name]
delete.description: This operation allows to delete object of LandInfo Plot by [Recorder_name and name] in cloud data store.

parameters.name: auth_key
parameters.description: Authenticatin key for using API.

parameters.name: recorder_name
parameters.description: Recorder name to collect LandInfo plot.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Plot name that collects LandInfo plot.

200.description: An array containing the ID’s of landcovers or landinfos to delete is given
